name: Cake Ninja
summary: Become a true Cake Ninja warrior in this simple, casual slice-em-up game. Cake Ninja invites you to slide the stylus across the screen to slice cakes into small pieces. It’s very easy to play. The more cakes you slice, the longer you stay around. The longer you survive, the higher your score. How long can you last? You can also challenge your friends to a multiplayer game and find out who’s the best player.
